title: Black Friday Deals & Sales
abstract: Check out the Black Friday Deals
content:
Though we don’t celebrate Thanksgiving (there are a few events listed if you are interested), there are Black Friday deals and sales that have popped up over the years. This year too there’s just a handful for the shopaholics. Brace yourself for a stampede (actually let’s all be civilised and not kill each other).
Black Friday sale offers tops priced at Rs. 600 - Rs. 1000, dresses priced at Rs. 1000 - Rs. 1500 and jeans priced at Rs 1500 at their Colombo 3,  Colombo 7,  KCC and Nugegoda outlets.

If you find more deals, please share them in the comments section.
